org.eclipse.dataset.function

Class MapToRotatedCartesian

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.function.MapToRotatedCartesian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetToDatasetFunction

    public class MapToRotatedCartesian
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatasetToDatasetFunction
    Map a 2D dataset from Cartesian to rotated Cartesian coordinates and return that remapped dataset from a rotated rectangle return a dataset and an unclipped unit version (for clipping compensation)
